short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create flashcard decks from your favorite songs on youtube, to learn languages faster!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Deck Buddy" is not just your ordinary browser extension; it's your gateway to effortless language learning, tailored to your favorite songs on YouTube. Picture this: you're learning Spanish, and your heart beats to the rhythm of Latin American music as you practice new words and local slang from your favorite country. With Deck Buddy, you can seamlessly extract vocabulary lists straight from your favorite songs—or any other YouTube favorite of yours—and integrate them into your language learning journey.

This extension simplifies the process like never before. Just copy the link to your beloved song on YouTube, and Deck Buddy works its magic, downloading a compact file containing the song's vocabulary alongside its translations. These files, neatly organized in CSV format, are compatible with a range of applications, from Anki—a popular flashcard app—to Microsoft Excel and text editors. What's more, they're fully customizable in spreadsheet programs like google sheets, empowering you to tailor your language learning experience to your unique preferences and needs.

Deck Buddy isn't just about extraction; it's about integration. Once you've downloaded your personalized vocabulary list, seamlessly integrate it into your preferred language learning applications. Whether you're honing your skills in Anki or exploring alternative platforms, Deck Buddy ensures a smooth transition, maximizing your learning potential without the hassle.

In a world where language learning meets musical passion, Deck Buddy is your trusted companion. Dive into the linguistic richness of your favorite songs, one vocabulary list at a time. Embrace the joy of discovery, the thrill of mastery, and the rhythm of learning with Deck Buddy—where language and music harmonize to elevate your journey.
